title: Emilia Clarke Rings In Her Birthday With An Epic GoT Reunion That Had Both Her On-Screen Lovers
text:
Emilia Clarke Rings In Her Birthday With An Epic GoT Reunion That Had Both Her On-Screen Lovers

Emilia Clarke Rings In Her Birthday With An Epic GoT Reunion That Had Both Her On-Screen Lovers

Game of Thrones might be over forever, but Emilia Clarke still holds a special place in her hearts, and she, without a doubt, will always be our beloved Khaleesi. Don’t you all agree?

Twitter

She recently reunited with her Game of Thrones family. It was a mini yet epic Game of Thrones reunion, which became even more memorable because it was Emilia’s 33rd birthday. When she united with her Game of Thrones co-stars Kit Harington and Jason Momoa, our hearts screamed Dracarys!

It was a hairy reunion as Emilia Clarke wrote in the caption, "Reunions never looked this hairy."

Emilia also appeared on The Graham Norton Show with Jason Momoa.

Don't Miss 335 SHARES 22.4 K SHARES 30.8 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 11.5 K SHARES

Camila Cabello, who is making waves for her song Senorita, also appeared on the show, and she couldn’t stop fangirling over her “queen”.

Twitter

“My queen!,” she exclaimed and said, “I’m sorry. I would just like to say I am the biggest Game of Thrones fan in the entire world. Literally, there’s a reason why I’m the only red wine on this table and it’s because I’m just freaking out to meet you guys. It’s going to take me about the whole time of this interview to recover from this. I’ve never fangirled so hard in my life,” she said.

"I’m such a fan of everybody here but I really went through a Game of Thrones [binge]. Literally, finished all eight seasons in a month this year," she added.

Emilia shared a backstage photo with her and wrote, "Oh GURL, the feelings mutual...thank you for making me feel like a Khaleesi all over again."

This is making you miss Game of Thrones, right? Don’t worry. You are not alone.
description: She recently reunited with her Game of Thrones family. It was a mini yet epic Game of Thrones reunion, which became even more memorable because it was Emilia’s 33rd birthday. When she united with her Game of Thrones co-stars Kit Harington and Jason Momoa, our hearts screamed Dracarys!
